name: H.M.S. Rustbucket
description:
Goal of the game:

You and your companion will need to co-operate to keep the H.M.S. Rustbucket up and running. And remember about Tea Time, or The Queen will be deeply disappointed.

Your ship is filled with different machines and objects. Every now and then some of them will light up signalizing an alarm. This means you need to interact with this object as fast as possible otherwise the ship will be damaged.
